title: froze game client
body:

it froze when you selecting a champion,

when you join a party
when you loading 
when you idle

the game is found but i can only waiting and froze

replies.body: The client freezing up that often might be a sign of a bad interaction between your hardware and software. Let's first make sure that there aren't any damaged game files that are causing those freezes. Go into your client options and initiate a repair, and let me know if your client keeps freezing up!

i did the hextech repair tool
nothing changes
the problem is when i join the lobby the game start freezing 
if i luckily loaded in the game i can play smoothly
i can play other game with no problem like doat2, star craft 2 ,storm hero , king of the kill,exc.
